thread.title: ISIS Claims Responsibility For U.K. Parliament Attack, 1 Of The Victims Identified As American
thread.title_full: ISIS Claims Responsibility For U.K. Parliament Attack, 1 Of The Victims Identified As American

author: Andrew Mark Miller
title: ISIS Claims Responsibility For U.K. Parliament Attack, 1 Of The Victims Identified As American
text:
10:57am March 23, 2017 Do you like this article? 
Yesterday, four people were killed and many more injured when a man drove through a crowd and then started stabbing people outside the Parliament building in London. 
It was a horrific attack and it served as another reminder that radical Islam in Europe is out of control. 
This morning, ISIS claimed responsibility fo the attack.   
From Fox News :   
The Islamic State has claimed responsibility for the terror attack that left four people dead, including the assailant and a police officer, outside of London’s Parliament building on Wednesday, according to the Amaq media agency.   
“The perpetrator of the attacks yesterday in front of the British Parliament in London is an Islamic State soldier and he carried out the operation in response to calls to target citizens of the coalition,” the Amaq statement said. 
Awful. 
It turns out that one of the victims of the attack was an American.   BREAKING: Third victim of Westminster terror attack named as American Kurt Cochran #LondonAttack pic.twitter.com/3l9hvPX1Ro   
— Lisa Daftari (@LisaDaftari) March 23, 2017   
From BBC : 
Kurt Cochran, from Utah, died in the attack and his wife Melissa was seriously hurt, their family has said. 
They were celebrating a 25th wedding anniversary and also visiting Melissa’s parents, who work on a Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints mission. 
Obviously, it is terrible when anyone loses their life but it is especially tragic that a fellow American was killed. 
Britain has a serious radical Islam problem. 
Time to do something about it… googletag.cmd.push(function() { googletag.display('div-gpt-ad-1481811813211-4'); });
